idea:
ARITAR ( A Dorfketal Company ) is a Technology startup , envisaged as Digital company with bringing IIOT (Industrial Internet of things ) disruption in Petrochemical ,Hydro Carbons , Oil , Health Care , Life Sciences Industry with a vision to extending business in Personal care ,3D printing , Catalysis etc. .

ARITAR has a modern Digital Transformation Framework as a core component of its exhaustive strategic road map. This is a Digital Industrial Frame Work which combines Domain Intelligent Analytics, Machine Learning & Artificial Intelligence Engine and harness power of Operation Architecture platform and an Industrial internet of things -architected portfolio of hardware, software, intelligent devices, and services.

Aritar Digital Acceleration Framework is lined to business philosophy of empowering existing precious human workforce by deep insights of plant process, quick decision making, and enhancing business outcomes. Framework will thus liberate smart plant operators engineers and other work forces with increased efficiency, safe working condition, Environmental preservation, also aiding to profitability of businesses with Smart /Cognitive Process, Operations and Equipmentâ€™s.

AIRTAR Business spectrum and Development covers clientele for Petrochemical , Oil , Hydro carbons etc. companies in India and Across globe like North America , Europe ,Asia Pacific by extending its parent Companies already existing arm of Chemical Additive manufacturing business and exploring New business prospects new clientele .

ARITAR projects a cumulative workforce addition on Technology Innovation(Machine Learning ,Artificial Intelligence, Software platforms , Networking ,and Hardware ) ,Manufacturing ,Chemical Engineering , Instrumentation ( Plant Process , Manufacturing Process , Plant IT,OT ,ET ) , operations ,human resource and other departments .It is in process onboarding experts from Industry on said domain . It has also tied up with Academia , Engineering collages ,Institutes to recruit and provide opportunity to University pass outs , providing them training , apprentice professional programs and absorb unfortunate talented work force from Industry losing job because of Pandemic Covid -19 .

Make In India , a prestigious imitative of Government of India & Honorable Prime Minister is pivotal force for ARITARs India first philosophy ,Further extending it as Make In India , Makeover the world .It will have major design development operations based out of India ( Mumbai , Pune ,Bangalore ) and also covering other B cities and Towns via Digital mode of work and collaborations .

ARITAR initiative is targeted to Create Innovation in Manufacturing Industry achieve profitability and Generate Revenues globally and locally

It is poised to create wealth for India by Software and Technology exports thus helping increasing foreign reserves and local tax reserves for the nation and state provinces.
name: ARITAR PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Funshalla is a leading sports company currently serving in Mumbai that work towards promoting outdoor sports activities among the kids that would help them to be mentally and physically fit while learning crucial aspects of sportsmanship, personal development and team-building activities. The proprietary innovative games and activities developed by Funshalla encourages the kids to spend more time in outdoor activities and away from their gadget screens.
name: FUNSHALLA INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
